original: Sauttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sauttaram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anuttaram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sauttaraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūle dve paccayavasena.)
analyzed: sauttaram akusalam dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūle dve paccaya vasena
